title: Genigma: Generative Puzzles
text:
Welcome to this generative puzzle book! Created using the open-source programming language R, this book is completely free! And here’s the best part: it never runs out! If you’re craving more puzzles, just come back tomorrow. This book refreshes itself every day, generating 9 brand-new mandalas, 18 sudoku, 18 word finders, 18 crossword puzzles and 18 nonograms for you to challenge yourself.
Click here to download today’s unique puzzle book! It is best printed on A5 (148x210mm or 5.8x8.3inch) paper.
